subject: Self Care
title: Flow State and Mindfulness
description: A fast breakdown of Flow State and Mindfulness for builders.

hook.text: Hours pass in what feels like minutes. You were so absorbed that the self disappeared. That's flow.

buildup.text: Csikszentmihalyi described flow as total absorption where challenge and skill perfectly balance.

discovery.text: Flow and mindfulness share neural signatures: reduced DMN activity, heightened present-moment focus.

twist.text: Flow happens to you. Mindfulness is chosen. Together they create sustained, intentional presence.

climax.text: Meditation trains the attention skills that make flow states more accessible and more frequent.

punchline.text: Mindfulness opens the door. Flow walks through it.

quiz.question: How are flow and mindfulness related?
options: Both reduce DMN activity and increase present-moment focus
Flow replaces the need for mindfulness
